text: The best work is not what is most difficult for you it is what you do best.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre

text: I have believed the best of every man. And find that to believe is enough to make a bad man show him at his best, or even a good man swings his lantern higher.
author: William Butler Yeats

text: The only failure one should fear, is not hugging to the purpose they see as best.
author: George Eliot

text: There is only one failure in life possible, and that is not to be true to the best one knows.
author: George Eliot

text: I'm proof against that word failure. I've seen behind it. The only failure a man ought to fear is failure of cleaving to the purpose he sees to be best.
author: George Eliot
